inn1.comm: 133.6 kph, decent pace from Shafiul right away, he comes forward and leaves it alone outside off
strays on to the pads with the angle, rolls away off the pads behind square
132.6 kph and much better line from Shafiul, comes in with the angle outside off stump, and he defends
134.5 kph, this one now straightens from outside off stump on a length, and he had no clue about it as he pushed at it from the back foot
lovely delivery, straightens again, this time from a fuller length, drew him forward, and zipped away past the outside edge
already has him in some trouble, he comes charging blindly down the track, but is nowhere near the line of one that moves away after coming in with the angle, super start from Shafiul
floated up and goes straight on, but was outside off stump, he had left it on length, fortunate it was not on off stump
goes forward to push away in the off side
uncertainly leaves another straight one outside off stump, not comfortable at all
tries to break free by haring blindly down the track, is beaten in flight, and gets an inside edge that beats stumps and keeper, Tamim gives chase and pulls it back
goes straight on with the angle, they are waiting for it to turn, off the inside edge on to the leg side
this one turns alright, but from short of a length, and outside off too, allows him to rock back and cut in the gap between cover and point for the first four of the game
135.5 kph effort delivery, bowled it very full and targeting the stumps with the angle, he just managed to get bat on it to push it back
gets this one to move in off the seam, but the angle was taking it down leg even as it strikes him on the pads, Sriram Veera says that Rahim was appealing for lbw from leg slip
outside off stump now, giving him the working over, just short of a length too, and straightens as well, too much for Eric who has a waft and is beaten
goes back to trying for the leg-before and hits him on the pads too, but again that is going way down leg
this is too good for Eric, another one straightens from a length outside off stump, he looks to drive weakly from the crease, and goes nowhere with it
comes forward and manages to push this one away towards point
flighted up around off stump, defended off the front foot
slightly short outside off stump, cut away to point
fired in quicker outside off stump, blocked down the track
shuffles across and works this one off the back foot to square leg
a bit short in length, allows him to go back and punch it towards covers
more short of a length stuff and going on with the angle on off stump, pushed off the back foot to the bowler
whoops, this one cuts in from short of a length outside off stump, and then moves away sharply in the air after passing the batsmen, Shafiul himself looked surprised
strays down the leg side once again, he misses on the flick, off the pads to Rahim
yorker this time, but outside leg stump, he had backed away way outside leg, and was beaten
better from the batsman, gets forward to a length ball and pushes it to mid off
how many plays-and-misses there have been inside five overs, this was a slower one outside off stump, he wanted to cut it away forcefully, but was beaten
tries another slower one, this time he gets bat to ball, and eases this in to the gap between cover and point
gets a thick outside edge as he pushes at one turning away outside off, goes past slip
goes for the sweep to a fuller one, is hit on the pads, and Bangladesh go up in appeal, looked to be struck outside the line, and was turning away too
this one goes straight on with the arm, and he goes back to awkwardly push it back
gives him the charge, but only gets an inside edge that goes to midwicket
worked away to midwicket off the back foot
now he comes down the track, close to the pitch of this one, and drives it wide of the man at long off
Shafiul continues to trouble Netherlands, strikes him high on the pads as he shuffles out to turn it away to midwicket
not in control again, gets an inside edge as he pushes at  a length ball
played away near the wicket, cannot get the ball of the square
comes down the track in search of freedom, cannot break the shackles though, another swing and miss outside off stump
jeez, that was not far from off stump, he had come forward for the cover drive, the inside edge went on to pad, and looped away close to the stumps
excellent control from the fast bowler, he took a step or two in the direction of one that came in  with the angle, but just as he swung the blade, it moved away past the outside edge
makes use of the feet, takes it on the half volley and drives it wide of long off
bowled slowly in the air, and it turns away from off stump, defended cautiously
takes two steps down the track, and smothers the spin on this one
hurries on with the arm, bowled quicker through the air, he is beaten outside off
again he leaves the crease to hit this one to mid on
another charge down the track, and now he connects neatly, swinging it high over mid on and it carries all the way
Shuvo the livewire at point, it was pushed to his left, and he went leaping i nthe air to cut off the shot, but they had time for the single
yet another one hits him on the pads, and yet another one sliding down the leg side with the angle
this one looked closer, cut in off the seam, and hit him above the knee roll, looked to be going slightly down leg, replays show it would have clipped leg stump, good call not to review it
hit hard off the front foot, but short extra cover is right in the way of the ball
pushed away to point from the crease from a length
lovely slower one, cuts it from wide outside off, he was looking to slam it through covers, but adjusted to push it wide of point who had a throw at the non-striker's end but missed

Shakib gets the breakthrough, strikes him on the pads as he pushed forward, playing outside the line for the turn, it went straight on, and umpire Tucker thought that was hitting the stumps after Shakib went down imploring on his knee, Netherlands think about a review, but decide against it
almost another one, tossed up on the stumps, hit him on the back leg, but after a big inside edge
Bukhari does what he has been sent to do, merrily swings this one high over midwicket
stays in the crease to push away a delivery that does not bounce much
fired in down the leg side and rolls away off the pads
comes down the track and blocks a flat delivery down the track
goes for a fierce cut from the crease, at least the intent was that, but another play-and-miss results
goes for the yorker, he manages to dig it out, Shafiul threatens to throw it back, striking a fearsome pose
goes for another yorker, this one is not as full, they risk the single even as the ball rolls towards mid on who fails to pick up the ball cleanly, else it could have been tight
another full delivery, driven hard in to the ground over the bowler, mid off has a shy at the non-striker's stumps, and misses
135.7 kph, this was coming, the short delivery, and Bukhari ducks right in to it, and is hit on the shoulder, Rahim collects, Bukhari practises the pull
another short one, this time outside off stump, and one more swing and miss, ho hum
punches this one in to the off side off the back foot
goes up in half-appeal as he strikes him high on the pads, would have gone down leg too
goes for the short of a length one in to the pads again, but even this one would have gone down leg, no bat on ball again
pacy fuller one that goes on with the angle, the pads are taking a hammering, but going down leg yet again
a touch straighter, around middle and full again, pushed away to mid on
grunts as he bowls one on a length around off stump, pushed away towards extra cover
flatter one that hurries on around off stump, pushed away towards covers

Razzak strikes, Bukhari went down on a knee and looked to swing it over midwicket thinking it would slide on with the angle, this one turned away from middle stump, and his swipe went high in the air, Rahim had already settled under it, and took it calmly in the end
this one does go on with the arm, pushed down the track
punched away towards extra cover off the back foot
flighted a shade outside off stump, and gets him to come out and drive, but Shuvo dives at short extra cover to cut it off
nothing to work with, flat and going on straight around off stump, played back down the track
pacy full delivery close to off stump with that slingy action, blocked away on the off side
length delivery outside off stump now, pushed away to point from the crease
slightly short of a length, and he rocks back to punch it away through covers but cannot time it well
gets front pad across and flicks a length ball away to deep square leg
ooh, somehow this one misses off stump, somehow, it was a very full one that swing in the air, and struck him on the pads, only to roll away inches from off stump
on a length outside off now, pushed away off the back foot
cut away off the back foot even as it slid on quickly outside off stump

slower through the air this time, pushed back down the track off the back foot, the bowler managed to get a hand to it, and it trickled on to the stumps, Bangladesh think they are on to something, replays show the non-striker had his bat on safe ground
hurries straight on around off stump, he adjusts to punch it down the ground to long off
down the track to a flighted one, and eases it away to long off
slides on with the arm quickly, he tried to turn it square on the leg side but missed
short and turning away outside off stump, cut away to sweeper cover
comes forward nicely to a full delivery on middle and pushes it with the full face to mid on
134.5 kph length ball close to off stump, he blocks it solidly
uses the angle on this one down the pads to whip it away to deep square leg
looks to force a length ball down the ground, too much bottom hand and he mistimes it to mid on
hits him on the pads with a very full delivery down the leg side as he misses out on the flick
full toss outside off stump, cannot get it away, pushed away towards covers
short of a length on the off, punched off the back foot to long-off
slightly short, guided towards point
looping towards middle, pushed back down the pitch to the bowler
comes down the track and pushes it down towards long-on
slightly short on the off, bowled flat, gets on the back foot and punches it to midwicket
angling in towards middle, presents the full face and drives it down the pitch
short and wide outside off stump, he uses the bounce to steer it in the air to third man
dropped Rahim has put down a straightforward chance, it was jabbed away to his left, was dying on him, but he was late in dropping to his left, and clanged it
targets the stumps with a much fuller one but it is angled down the pads
gets width, goes forward and tries to crash it away through covers, goes off a thick edge to third man
backs away a touch outside leg stump, he cramps him up with a length ball angled on the stumps, pushed away towards extra cover
eases in to a smooth-looking drive to a wide on outside off stump, a diving short extra cover tidies up
fuller one on leg stump, eased down to mid on
driven to long off for a run
leaves the crease to take this one on the half volley, but cannot get it past the bowler
pushed back to Shakib off the back foot
takes a step towards the flat delivery and pushes it down to long on
still flatter and on the stumps, blocked off the front foot
sliding down the leg side as he is hit on the pads
flighted delivery, taken on the half volley and driven wide of long off
again tosses it up nicely, he almost yorks himself as he comes down the track, squeezed out to point in the end
fuller one now, pushed back to the bowler
takes a step out to the pitch of one outside off stump, and drives it to extra cover
slows down this one considerably outside off, he blocks it down the track
pushes a fuller one down the track
off the inside edge in front of square leg as he pushes off the front foot
comes out and eases this one to long on
hurries on with the arm, it would have taken out off had he not jabbed it way on the off side in the end
more width outside off stump this time, he steers it late past short third man, who rushes after it and pulls it back just inside the ropes, Kayes it was
ooh, stopped a bit on him, and he pushed it in the air, but it fell just short of a diving short extra cover
very full on the stumps, driven down the track
cannot use the angle on this one fired in on leg stump, pushes it away to midwicket
gets forward to push this one to short extra cover
driven down the ground to long on this time
nothing much happening out here, comes down the track but blocks it away in the end to the bowler
singles are all that are coming, this time it is worked away off the hip to deep square leg
punched off the back foot to long on for another single
slower through the air, and turning away, he opens the face to run it wide of short third man
goes deep in the crease to work this one away wide of midwicket for a couple of runs
another couple, what is happening to the world, so much action all around, this time backward of square leg

more action, this time a wicket, in the most unfortunate of manners, it was a full toss hit hard down the track, Shakib got a hand to it, and it rolled on to the stumps, the non-striker was watching all the action unfold calmly, but from a foot outside the crease, and has to walk back now
defended off an inside edge to midwicket
keeps low and goes on towards middle stump, worked away to midwicket
jabbed away off the back foot to point
goes on leg stump, he goes across to nudge it behind square leg
full delivery on the stumps, hit hard along the ground to long off
beaten in the flight as he charges down the track, thick inside edge rolls away to deep square leg
on the middle stump this time, pushed back to the bowler
fired in flat on leg stump, tucked away behind square
uses the angle on this one fired in on leg stump, lifts it in the air over midwicket for a boundary
more aggression from Cooper, this time over mid on, uses the flight to have a clean swing of the arms, and connects well
pushed down the track off the front foot
quicker now, pushed away towards short extra cover
driven hard down the ground to long off, and Cooper will keep strike

what a waste of a wicket, but what nifty work from Rahim, it was cut away hard off the back foot but point got quickly to his right, even as the batsmen hesitated for a moment, he fired in the throw which was way outside the crease, but Rahim took it cleanly low to his left and then lobbed it back on to the stumps to catch the batsman comfortably short of his ground, no need for the third umpire
fired in on the middle stump, defended down the track
bit more air, and around leg stump, he drives inside out back to the bowler who leaps to his left and stops the ball
defended on the leg side off the front foot

almost another run-out, suddenly the world seems to have changed completely, so much urgency from Netherlands, he pushed it to mid on and came charging for the run, before he was sent back just as the throw came in
blocked off the front foot down the pitch
goes across the stumps to nudge one on leg stump towards square leg
pushes forward uncertainly to one that hung in the air for a while outside off stump
plays out this one in to the leg side off the back foot
takes a step forward and offers a dead bat to one on middle stump
comes down the track to take this one on the half volley and drive it to long off
turn from around off stump, but from a length and allows him to go back and defend
comes down the pitch, nit quite to the pitch of the delivery but manages to chip it in the air high over mid on who pulls it back near the ropes
bat and pad close together as he pushes forward in defence

fires in a flat and quicker one, it is pad first as he pushes forward again, Shuvo is very much interested, the umpire is not, Bangladesh go for the review, it would have hit off stump, the crowd cheer as they see that on the large screen, but he was struck outside the line of off
pushes forward again to another flatter one and this time manages to block it off bat
looks to skip down the track, he fires it in and Tendo takes it on the pads
pushed to mid on for a quick single, there was some hesitation as they went through
gets it to turn and bounce outside off stump, chopped away into the ground
goes back in the crease to work away a length ball to deep midwicket
pushed through flat and quick outside off stump, he goes for the cut but hits it to point
nice free-flowing drive down the ground to long off from way down the track
too much of front pad going across, could have been dangerous but he managed to get bat in the way
strange way of playing these spinners, front pad goes a long way across again, he has to bring the bat quickly down to push it towards covers
bowled slowly through the air outside off stump, pushed away towards point
charges down the track without conviction, as a break-free ploy, and takes it on the apds
and again, this time he gets bat to it to smother it on the off side
gets bat across front  pad to steal single near the wicket on the leg side
rocks back and eases away this shortish one wide of sweeper cover
Tendo skips down the track, takes this one on the half volley and lifts it with the turn wide of long off, couple of bounce into the boundary
141.1 kph and fired in from that slingy action, cuts back in even as it is pushed away to short extra cover
goes for the pull to a pacy shortish delivery, it loops in the air and falls short and wide of mid on
lets the ball come on to him outside off stump, and cuts it with a flourish wide of point
113.8 kph lovely slower one, he was already forward and pushes it away to short extra cover
they take on Shafiul at mid off, and take the single even as the throw misses at the striker's end
pushed away off the front foot towards point
gets too close to the delivery as he charges down the track, but manages to push it to long on in the end
goes straight on with the angle, worked away to midwicket
again he leaves the crease and pushes this one away towards extra cover
the 100 finally comes up with a charge down the wicket and a drive that goes to long off
dropped gets in to position very quickly for the pull, but hits it very hard straight to midwicket who cannot hold on to it
worked away on the leg side off the back foot
punched off the back foot to short extra cover
waits on this length ball to cut back in close to off, and guides it wide of point for a run, he is home even as the throw finds the stumps, they go to the third umpire just to be doubly sure
goes for the yorker, but it ends up as a full toss on the stump, he made room outside leg and smashed it in the gap to the left of Shafiul at mid off who gave up the chase close to the ropes
blocked off the front foot in to the off side
marginally short, but he latched on to it hungrily, just lifted it in the air with a short-arm jab and it bounced in to the boundary wide of deep midwicket
gets an inside edge on to pad as he comes forward to a very full one outside off
leaves the crease, Shuvo sees him do that and fires it in, played out on the leg side

again they survive on the edge, attempt a quick single in front of covers, he would have been gone if the throw had hit the stumps, but in the time the keeper took to remove the bails, he just about dragged his bat in, as the replays show

no need of a replay this time, that attempt at breaking free, takes two steps down the crease, it is fired in even as he goes down on a knee to slog it over midwicket, the ball turned past the swipe, and Rahim completed the comfortable stumping, no problems at all
connects with the sweep to a fuller one and gets it wide of deep square leg
pushed in to the leg side off the front foot
short and wide, slapped away towards covers off the back foot
gets bat and pad close together to push an angled length ball in front of mid on, and they go through for the single
pegs him on the back foot with a 134.9 kph length ball that angles in, he pushes it away on the off side
goes for the yorker now, does not get it quite in the blockhole, dug out on the off side
strays down the leg side in the yorker quest, he tickles it on its way fine for a boundary, off the pads, says the umpire
hit on the pads with a fuller one, but always sliding down leg with that sharp angle in to the batsman
beats him with a short of a length delivery that was dug in outside off stump, bounced extra and was too close for the cut which he attempted, and was beaten
did this one carry? he lured him in to the near-fatal prod outside off stump, but the outside edge fell just short of slip
driven hard down the ground to long off
goes back to take this one from middle stump, and cut it away to sweeper cover
tosses it up and gets him to push in the air, but well short of short extra cover
fired in quicker, he defends, bat and pad close together
looks to take the ball early by leaving the crease, cannot get it away, pushed down the track
is beaten on the cut, it was short of a length outside off stump, and a tad close to off for the shot
lovely delivery, 134.2 kph angles in off a length very close to off stump, he ends up pushing inside the line
uses the angle now off this full delivery to flick it in front of square leg
dug in short of a length, but some width on offer and he uses it to steer it to third man
bat and pad tight together as he comes forward to block this one away on the off side
coming in with the angle from a length, nudged wide of mid on for a quick single

goes for the sweep to a flat and straight one on the stumps, misses and is hit on the pads, looked pretty okay, umpire Tucker thought so, Netherlands go for the review, that is taking out middle, de Grooth gone, and a review too
flatter and fuller, eased away to short extra cover

and another one, softest dismissal for quite a while I must say, takes this full delivery from middle stump, and flicks it right in to the hands of short midwicket, who himself looks surprised but takes the dolly easily, too bad he didn't say 'thank you'
they'll keep coming at you till eternity, another one flat on the stumps, defended off the front foot
loops in the air as he comes forward to one on leg stump, no one close by on the on side
tossed up further this time around off stump, comes forward to smother it
guides this one outside off stump wide of point, and by the time third man lumbers across, they manage the third as well

full and strikes him on the pads as he attempts to push forward, Rubel goes up in a stifled appeal, probably because there seemed to be an inside edge, replays do not say so, that was pretty close, was grazing leg stump in fact
steered away to third man from wide outside off stump
full toss down the leg side, he misses on the flick, and it rolls away off the pads
played out in front of covers for a quick single
fuller around off stump and dead-batted down the track off the front foot
looks to tap in front of covers and run, but they decide against the latter action
down the pads, and tickled away wide of short fine leg
again, not as fine a nudge this time, and short fine leg fires in the throw but no damage done
worked away off the pads wide of midwicket
down the track, takes it on the half volley and drives it to the right of long off who puts in the dive to save the boundary
angled down the pads, he misses on the flick, and it is not called a wide as well
comes forward and defends this one on off stump
does he go for the sweep, the jab, the nudge, in the end he plays it away in front of square off a half-bent knee

Shuvo charges in from point, dives forward and lobs the ball under-arm to Rahim who takes off the bails and finds Borren just short of his ground even after a despairing dive, they were attempting the quick single but took on the wrong man
nudged away backward of square leg off the back foot
played away to midwicket off the front foot
Seelaar survives, comes forward and kills this one on the off side
defended down the track off the front foot
down the track, he drops it shorter, and he pushes it away towards short extra cover
guides a fuller one off the front foot towards point
cannot get it away after repeated attempts, skips down the track and defends in to the off side
a run, finally, a run, rocks back and punches a shortish one down to long off
tossed up invitingly outside off stump, Seelaar is not venturing anywhere, calmly pats it away off the front foot
makes no difference, he can't get it away again, pushed away in to the off side off the back foot
played out to point off the back foot
slower one at 111.8 kph, he lunges out and guides it to point, dot deliveries by the dozen
take it while you can, these are rarities, some width outside off stump, and he gets it down to third man
the guest appearance is over, back to the dots, another one blocked in to the off side

and Rubel ends Seelaar's stone-walling, he got too far across to a fuller one and looked to waft across the line, missed completely, pad got in the way of the ball that was headed for leg stump, and he is sent back on his way
lifts a full toss through midwicket, non-striker was in some bother as he charged back for the second, but made it just in time
looks to flick a full delivery through square leg, but cannot get bat to ball
chipped in the air on the bounce to long on, Tendo knows he could have done better than that
he gets behind the line of a full one on the stumps and pushes it back to the bowler with the full face of the bat
stays in the crease and blocks a length ball, which rolls away off the inside edge behind the stumps on the leg side
he lives on, keeps out a fuller one angled in to the stumps off an inside edge towards square leg
hammers a full delivery through midwicket, by the time the man on the boundary gets to it, they come back for two
another full one lifted down the ground and Tendo takes another couple
comes forward to a length ball outside off stump, and the inside edge trickles on the leg side
Tendo goes over deep midwicket, lifts a fuller delivery high in the air, one leg in the air as he does that, gets six for all the effort
and leaves just one ball for No 11 with a jab to third man
137.6 kph, full and  targetting the stumps, he survives, gets behind the line to defend, well done
slashes at a full delivery wide outside off stump, and gets it in the gap between short third man and backward point, no chance for both of them, and acknowledges the applause for his 50
pushed away off the back foot towards covers
goes for the cut to a quicker one that goes straight on, and is beaten
played out in to the off side off the back foot

takes a step out, looking to flick this fuller one, misses and is hit on the pads, Bangladesh go up in appeal, which is turned down, they go for the review which shows the ball clipping leg stump, and the on-field call stands
keeps out a flatter one on the leg stump in front of square leg
, a sitter, Razzak at deep square leg gets a flick from Tendo at catchable height, and clangs it, that was a simple chance

Razzak is relieved, Netherlands' self-destruction ends with Tendo getting stranded, a drive off a fuller delivery that goes towards extra cover, Raja had taken off for the single, and had no chance for coming back, the fielder took ages to get the ball to the bowler, he could afford to with Raja stranded miles at sea, and Shafiul calmly took off the bails, got to feel for Tendo, 22 deliveries left unused, what a shame

inn2.comm: goodish length on middle, gets across and turns it to midwicket off the front foot
beaten, came back in, good length and he is induced into driving at the ball but it just nipped back in to get to the keeper through the gap

Bukhari's struck in the first over, around a good length on the off, appeared to nip back in, Tamim was pushing through the line, got an inside edge onto the thighs and then onto the off stump. There's no controlling Bukhari, he's pumped
good length on the off, gets forward to the pitch and defends it solidly
short of a good length on middle, gets on the back foot and punches it back to the bowler, Bukhari exchanges stares with Junaid
lets out a grunt as he delivers that from round the wicket, on middle and off, tapped into the off side
shortish on the off, much slower through the air, moves back and defends it into the off side
short of a good length on the off, another big grunt, punched back to the bowler, no turn, just alterations in length and pace
slowed it up this time, looped it up on middle and off, gets a stride out and defends
angling in towards middle and leg, swept towards short fine leg
first runs, pitched up on middle and leg, driven firmly through midwicket and mid-on for three runs, big cheers from the crowd
short of a good length outside off, holds its line, lets it through
pushed it a little fuller, not quite the right length to cut, tries to slash it through point but it doesn't rise as much as he expected
in the channel outside off, a probing line, lets it through to the keeper
short and wide and he goes after it again but fails to make contact, reached for it but couldn't connect
in the corridor on a good length, a hint of movement in towards the batsman but wide enough to leave it be
slightly short outside off, leaves it alone to the keeper, moving away but only slightly, two maidens for Bukhari
flighted on middle, gets a stride out and plays it back to the bowler
gets across to a delivery angling towards leg stump, tries to tickle it fine, is struck on the pads, a stifled appeal from the bowler
floating it full on the off, drawing the batsman forward, driven down to mid-off
tossed up on the off, gets forward and pushes it gently to extra cover
fires it slightly quicker on middle, flicked away off the front foot past midwicket for a single to get off the mark
bowls it on a good length just outside off, gets forward and taps it in the direction of cover
inside edge, almost dragged it on, short of a good length outside off, tried to punch it through extra cover, the shot was on but the bat face turned at the last moment
short and he's seized the length early, banged in on middle, rocks forward and then back and pulls it stylishly over square leg for a welcome boundary
shortish on the off, gets on the back foot and punches it towards extra cover
draws him forward with a ball on the good length, Junaid gets a big stride out and pushes it through to mid-off
short of a good length, gets forward and knocks it towards extra cover
crunched off the front foot on the up but back to the bowler, slow start to the chase by the hosts but it's not an easy pitch
slapped, short and wide, waited for it to turn away and thwacked it between extra cover and mid-off for four
good bounce, goodish length on middle, gets back to turn it square, struck high on the pads
loopy full toss on the off stump, driven gently to mid-off, will feel he missed out there
ooh, stifled appeal for lbw though there as an inside edge, floating it on middle, tried to sweep it fine, got a feather and towards short fine for a single
keeping it flat this time, on middle, goes on straight, meets it with the full face with a big stride
a single wide of short fine, tries to push through the line, gets a thick inside edge behind square
pitched up on the off and he sensed a chance, went at it a little hard and wasn't able to time it well, rolled down to mid-off
short of a length outside off, cracked hard but straight to cover
tries to clear him over square leg, got across to flick it, was in the slot but missed out. Pitched outside leg and moved in a hint
short of a good length on middle, gets on the back foot and plays it to cover
short of a good length, driven on the up towards extra cover

goes over, a hint of desperation in that one but it pays off, slightly short on the off and he swings it over midwicket, not timed too well but has enough legs on it to beat the fielder in the deep running across
loopy full toss outside leg stump, sweeps it towards short fine
on middle and off, gets a stride out and defends it into the off side
gets forward and defends that straight delivery with bat close to pad on the leg side
flighted on middle, he's eyed his spot, dragged it through square leg, there is a fielder there position in the deep but it's struck sweetly to beat him to the ropes
angling it on leg stump, tickles it towards short fine
flighted on the off, gets to the pitch and drives it to mid-off
starts with a steady line in the channel outside off, shoulders arms to that one
appeared to pitch outside leg and moved in towards middle, got back to play it square, missed and was struck on the pads but it landed outside leg, appeal turned down
slightly short on middle, gets on the back foot and works it to square leg
good length just around off stump, is behind it nicely and defends it solidly into the off side
lands on a length outside off, driven on the bounce to the extra cover lurking on the off side
aiming for the blockhole outside off, digs it out towards cover

ooh, there is a silly mid-off in place but that just evaded him, shortish on the off, the ball stopped on him a hint, he went through his punch through the line and just managed to get it over the silly mid-off fielder, just evaded him

follows that up with a short ball, pulls it hard wide of square leg, there is a deep square leg in place, Seelaar moved across, slid and appeared to fumble it the first time but kicked it into the field just as it seemed it would get away
pushed into the off side off the back foot
tossed up on middle and off, driven back to the bowler
poor ball, juicy full toss on middle, mistimes that swing as he gets it past midwicket, Seelaar runs across from deep square leg to keep them to two
well done at point, short ball, was slashed but the fielder dived full length to his left to stop that
strays on the pads, flicks it behind square leg for a couple of runs
short ball on the off, there's not timing it too well, pulled towards deep square leg for a single
singles coming much more easily now, short of a good length on middle and leg, turns the face and places it through square leg
a touch fuller but again on middle and leg, gets across to push it down to mid-on
lands on a length on leg stump, chips it in the direction of deep midwicket for a single
full toss outside off, was above waist-height, smacked over point for a comfortable boundary, was a freebie from ten Doeschate
follows that up with a full delivery down the leg side, called a wide
ten Doeschate slipping up here, another wide down the leg side
fullish on middle and off and is met with a solid defence into the off side
floats it full on leg stump, pushed towards midwicket
flighted it on the off, pushed towards point off the front foot
quicker through the air, bowled short on middle, worked away through square leg
bowls it around a good length on the off, gets forward and taps it back down the pitch
tickled wide of short fine and the fielder there does a fine job diving to his left and preventing the single
a tidy over to begin with, pitched up on the off, driven straight to midwicket
slightly short on the off, gets on the back foot and punches it to cover
gets on the front foot and drives it towards extra cover
appeal for lbw, seemed to pitch outside leg, shuffled well across to glance it fine but was struck on the pads. Netherlands have called for a referral. The original decision was Not Out.
another full toss from ten Doeschate but he has a packed off-side field, struck to point but can't beat the in-field

streaky boundary, good length outside off, appeared to move away just a hint, went hard at it, wasn't to the pitch but went through with it anyway, thick outside edge but well wide of the wicketkeeper
good length on middle, gets forward and defends it solidly back to the bowler
short ball, pulled away hard but straight to deep midwicket for a single
tickled into the leg side for a single to raise the 50-partnership, Bangladesh are on track
floating it just outside off, works it away behind square for a single
comes down the track and drives it down to long-on for one more
fullish outside off, dug out in the direction of point
found the gap despite a packed off-side field, short outside off, picked the length early, rocked back and punched it hard past the diving extra cover
slower one bowled short outside off, dabs it in front of point
he's not been very accurate today, has he? Another wide, his third, down the leg side
slower offcutter, cut away from a good length as he poked at it to beat the outside edge
good length on the off, mistimed for the umpteenth time, was looking to loft it over mid-off but ended up slicing it over point, nevertheless it was good enough to roll down towards the ropes
short of a good length on middle, gets back and taps it down the pitch
sliding it on middle and leg, turned away through square leg for a single
straying on the pads, easy runs for Junaid as he glaces it down wide of the fine-leg fielder for a couple of runs
worked away towards midwicket
flighted on leg stump, closes the face to play it to short fine
full toss on middle, punches it towards midwicket, fails to dispatch it
floating it on middle, gets a big stride out and defends it down the pitch
pitched it up and Kayes drove it well to squeeze it through that gap between point and cover
four more, pitched it up outside off, on the right length and he drives it hard in front of cover this time, off the meat and to the ropes
Progressing fluently are Bangladesh now, plays the late cut, short and wide and he guided it cleverly wide of third man
short of a good length outside off, run down to third man for a single
short and wide, cracked off the back foot through point for a single
angling on the pads, short ball, tries to feather it past the keeper but it strikes his thighs, they squeeze a leg bye
flighted on middle, pushed firmly towards midwicket
tosses it up outside off, lands on a length, tries to drive it through extra cover, the bat turns in his hand and the ball rolls down to the bowler
short, punched off the back foot towards extra cover
pushed off the front foot towards midwicket
slightly short outside off, waits for it to turn in just a hint and opens the face delicately to run it behind third man for a couple more
stepped out but Seelaar held his length ball, turning in from outside off, padded it away
short of a good length outside off, punched towards extra cover
quick single, pushes it down just wide of mid-on for a single
beaten, fished for one that was just outside off, dabbed at it inside the line, missed
dropped, short of a good length outside off, tries to push it from the crease towards cover, gets a thick edge and the keeper can't hold on, a really tough chance gone down
full outside off, eased off the front foot towards deep cover for a single
good lengh outside off, steers it wide of point into the deep for one more
bowls it full on the off, chips it towards long-on for a single
full toss but he opts to just push it gently down the ground to long-on
turned in sharply from outside off and there was good bounce as well, looked to cut but that was the wrong length for the shot, surprised the batman and the keeper
punched off the back foot towards deep cover for a single
short, waiting for it to turn in, chops it towards point
flatter, opens the face and steers it through point into the deep for a single
full outside off, pushed through cover
Kayes brings up his half-century, began slowly but picked up, eased through the off side for a single, a solid knock and he's put Bangladesh in complete control of this chase with his partner
short of a good length outside off, stands tall and cracks it to deep cover for a single
slower ball there by Borren, lands on a length, pushed past extra cover for a single
a tame dismissal there, that was short and wide, had all the time in the world to hit it anywhere he wanted, instead it slapped it straight to extra cover where Seelaar made no mistake
short of a length outside off, allows it through to the keeper
short of a good length on the off, pushed into the off side
played down the ground towards long-on for a single
flighted outside off, lands full, driven straight to extra cover
short outside off, turning in, reaches for it and swats it hard past extra cover but it's a diving stop again, just the single
the Dutch won't give away anything in the field, tossed up and it's struck hard again but extra cover's into the act again preventing the single with a full-length dive
shortish outside off, bowled flat, mistimes an attempted cut to cover
around a good length on middle from round the wicket, defended back down the pitch
short and wide and it;s slashed hard, past the diving point into the deep for a couple of runs
pitched up outside off, forces it between extra cover and point for a single
did that stop on him? Or did he push at it a little too early? Landed slightly short, reached forward and took his bottom hand off, went off the slice and landed short of point
gets forward and turns it into the leg side
was the slower legcutter, from the back of the hand, chops it down to point
shortish on the off, gets on the back foot and punches it to long-on for a single
yorked himself there, was looped up but he played it from the crease, failed to dig it out as he tried to play it into the off side
finally off the mark with a mistimed punch past point
flighted on the off, gets front and across and drives it back to the bowler
quicker delivery bowled short outside off, tried to open the face, missed, the keeper collected well and took off the bails, Dar's called for a replay but Kayes is comfortably in
turning in, gets on the back foot and works it square for a single
pushing it on a length on the off from round the wicket, played to cover
short and wide, reaches for it and chops it down towards third man for a single brings up the 100 for Bangladesh
was the slower legcutter again, Shahriar waited for it to cut in and guided it down to third man for a single
short and wide, Kayes is looking very fluent now, cuts it behind point, third man runs across and keeps them down to a couple
angling in towards off, gets forward and defends it in front of cover
firing it on middle, nudges it behind square for a single to keep strike
slightly short on the off, moves back and punches it down the ground for a single to long-on
turning in from outside off, gets behind it and drops it in front of cover
flighted on the off, gets a big stride out and plays it back to the bowler
inside edge, was forced through quicker on the off stump, tried to drive it through the line but it turned in, got an inside edge past short fine
flighted on middle, pushes it back down the pitch to the bowler
short ball outside off, gets on the back foot and chops it towards point
full outside off, square-driven wide of point for a single
back of a length on middle and off, gets back and drops it in front of the bowler
shortish on the off, punched back to the bowler from the crease
nipped back in just a touch from the off stump, got across and played it in front of midwicket
back of a length on the off, he's not connecting them too well is Shahriar, chopped down towards point
back of a length again, can't beat the in-field, knocks it straight towards cover
angling in towards off from round the wicket, driven straight to extra cover
slices that uppishly wide of point for a single
tossed up on the off, driven down towards long-off for a single
full toss on middle, flicked through midwicket into the deep for a single
finds the gap this time, short outside off, waited for it to turn away and slapped it past the diving extra cover for a couple of runs
flighted on the off, leans into the drive as he plays it to long-off to keep the strike
pitched up on the off, pushes it towards mid-off off the front foot
short on the off, tries to swat it past mid-off but got an inside edge
shortish outside off, cracks it from the crease towards extra cover
whack! His first authoritative shot, good length ball outside off, bends down on one knee and caressess it past mid-off, off the meat, that should give him some confidence after a slow start
back of a length outside off, tries to chop it towards point, sneaks a quick single as it drops on the off side
short and wide, was looking to cut, the ball was ripe for such a shot but he inside edged it in front of the keeper
floating it outside off, waits for it to turn away and evn though there is a slip in place he risks opening the face to guide it behind him for a couple
tossed up on middle, driven towards cover off the front foot
slightly short on middle and off, defended into the off side
short outside off, a rare lapse in the field from the Dutch, it;s slapped off the back foot and there's a misfield at cover
thick outside edge as he tries to chase a slightly wide delivery with an attempt to drive it towards cover

between keeper and slip, flighted ball outside off, his eyes lit up as he looked to cream it through cover, the ball landed in the rought, spun away, and went  right between keeper and slip. And guess what, it didn't take the outside edge
pushed through towards mid-on
slightly short on the off, chopped in front of point for a quick single
worked away off the front foot behind square for a single
slower ball and he was into the shot a little too early there, went across and tried to close the face, the ball cut away to take the leading edge
good length, driven firmly through the line wide of mid-off for a single
slower offcutter, played away towards cover
short ball outside off, cracked off the back foot to cover
low full toss on middle, driven firmly but straight to mid-off
looping it on middle, reaches for it and nudges it to mid-off
short on the off, waits for it to turn away and punches it but can;t get it past cover
identical result, had to reach for it a little more but cover's again into the action
dropped into the off side, thinks of a single but it isn;t there
swing and a miss, good length ball, tried to send it back to Dhaka but made no contact
slower delivery bowled full on the off, pushed through to mid-off
nicely done, delicately opens the face to place it wide of third man for a single, was slightly short outside off
angling it towards leg stump, tries to flick it past midwicket, is struck on the pads
full on the pads again, he's doled out quite a few of them this innings but the Bangladesh batsman haven't quite been able to dispatch them, like here for instance, all they can manage is a leg bye
fires it full on leg stump, tries to dig it with a closed face, gets an inside edge down to fine leg for a single
Shahriar continues to struggle to pierce the off-side field, slapped to cover
some turn and bounce, shapes up to play the cut, misses and the keeper fumbles
closes the face too early this time and gets a leading edge that falls short of the bowler
only a matter of time, tossed up and he charges down the track to hammer it over the bowler's head to bring up a one-bounce four, it also brings up 2000 runs for him in ODIs
chipped back towards the bowler, just wide of his outstretched arms as it goes to mid-off
nudged towards point but no single on offer
tossed up on leg stump, turned past square leg for a single
quicker through the air and flat, gets forward and defends it back to the bowler
sliding it outside leg stump and Shahriar  takes full toll, sweeping it powerfully past short fine leg for a boundary, the 50 partnership is up
punched off the back foot towards point
floated on the off, pushed towards extra cover off the front foot
finds the gap through the infield this time, short, turns away, gets back and thumps it past extra cover for a couple
short and wide, fails to dismiss it through the gap in the off side, finds cover but sneaks a single
flighted on the off, pushed off the front foot to cover
is a low full toss, goes for the slog-sweep, mistimes it but still gets three as it he plays it past midwicket into a yawning gap
lovely placement, it's on the pads and he swivels and just helps it on its way past short fine leg
bowled round his legs, it's tossed up on leg stump, tries to sweep it fine again but misses, it turns in to take out leg stump
he goes after a wide one immediately but it keeps a little low, misses
slightly short on the off, gets on the back foot and drops it into the off side
closes the face and dabs it towards mid-on
played back to the bowler
short on middle, waits for it to turn in and pulls it behind square for a single
turning in from a good length, gets across and is trapped on the pads but it would have gone down leg
gets on the back foot and jabs it towards deep square leg for a single
short outside off, chopped towards point
full toss on middle and leg, just punched to mid-on
full toss again but a quicker one, played back to the bowler

Shakib has to go because ten Doeschate has taken an excellent catch at cover, was tossed up, he tried to loft that inside out over extra cover, didn't time it well at all, ten Doeschate ran back not taking his eyes off for a moment, dived full stretch and clasped it
pitched up on the off, pushed towards extra cover
bowled flat on the off stump, driven firmly but again cannot beat extra cover
flighted on the off, pushed through straight to mid-off
slightly short on middle, punched off the back foot to mid-on
short on the off, punched off the back foot to cover
slightly short outside off, holds its line, lets it through
flighted on the off, digs it towards point
quicker through the air, gets on the back foot and defends it to cover, another maiden
angling in towards middle and off, defended towards cover
not managing to dispatch the full toss, was on middle, reverse-swept it to point
short and wide, dot ball again, cut straight to point
full on middle, pushed straight to extra cover
fails to dispatch another full toss, on middle, pushes it to extra cover
almost did a Shakib there, tried to go inside out and attempt the same shot, except that this fell safe behind cover, Bangladesh are not helping themselves with this
slightly short on leg stump, gets back and nudges it to short fine leg
flighted on leg stump, pushed wide of midwicket for a single
slightly short outside off, turning in, chops it towards point
gently chips it into the leg side off the front foot
flighted on the off, comes down the track but mistimes a drive to mid-off
short on middle, rocks back and pulls it to deep midwicket for a single to get off the mark
finds the gap, some attacking intent from Mushfiqur, was tossed up, comes down the track and caresses it past a diving extra cover for a boundary, scores level now
finishes it off with a six, short on middle and he rocks back to pull it into the crowd behind midwicket
